text.name: info1
text.text: FinalBurn Neo, also known as FBNeo or FBN is an arcade system

text.name: info2
text.text: emulator that is based on FinalBurn Alpha. It's a fork of MAME

text.name: info3
text.text: and supports boards such as Capcom CPS, Neo Geo MVS and

text.name: info4
text.text: numerous systems from SEGA, Konami, Irem and others.
